    • Uses of LocaleResolver in org.agilej.sparkle.core.request

      Classes in org.agilej.sparkle.core.request that implement LocaleResolver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AcceptHeaderLocaleResolver
      Locale resolver which get locale from http header.
      class  CookieBasedLocaleResolver
      Locale resolver which can get and set locale from cookie value.
      Methods in org.agilej.sparkle.core.request that return LocaleResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LocaleResolver LocaleResolverResolver.defaultLocaleResolver()
      return a default locale resolver instance, which is AcceptHeaderLocaleResolver
      static LocaleResolver LocaleResolverHolder.get()
      get the global LocaleResolver instance
      protected LocaleResolver AbstractWebRequest.localeResolver()
      return application scoped LocaleResolver, if not configured in Config, must return a default one.
      LocaleResolver LocaleResolverResolver.resolve()
      resolve locale resolver from config, if user not config it must return a default locale resolver.
      Methods in org.agilej.sparkle.core.request with parameters of type LocaleResolver 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void LocaleResolverHolder.set(LocaleResolver localeResolver)
      set global LocaleResolver instance
